item.title: Trump to sign orders ending diversity programs
item.description: Trump is set to axe funding dedicated to promoting diversity, equity and inclusion within the federal government.

item.title: Watch Live: Trump's 2025 inauguration ceremony at the Capitol
item.description: Donald Trump is now the 47th president of the United States. Follow live coverage and watch a live stream of the inauguration here.

item.title: Trump, Vance sworn in at inauguration at U.S. Capitol
item.description: President Trump and Vice President JD Vance have been sworn in moments after officially taking office at noon on the dot. Chief Justice John Roberts s...

item.title: Costco workers ready to strike on Feb. 1, Teamsters say
item.description: Costco Teamsters voted to authorize nationwide walkout by more than 18,000 workers over wages and benefits.

item.title: Cardinal Nolan, Rev. Graham pray at Trump's inauguration
